an5.8:1.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
an5.8:1.7: witless fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
an5.8:1.8: A mendicant with these five qualities fails, and doesn’t establish themselves in the true teaching.
an5.8:2.1: A mendicant with five qualities doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.
an5.8:2.7: wise doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.
an5.8:2.8: A mendicant with these five qualities doesn’t fail, and establishes themselves in the true teaching.”
